title: MD
biography: Markku Laakso is a Finnish professor of medicine and a type 2 diabetes researcher. He was awarded the Matti Äyräpää Prize in 2007, the Kelly West Award in 2008, and the Finnish Science Award in 2015.
aiSummary: Markku Laakso is a diabetes genetics specialist with an H-index of 225 at University of Eastern Finland (Faculty). Has been published in Nature, New England Journal of Medicine, The Lancet. Based in Finland.
